title: Leading IPOs in the U.S. 2019
yAxis: Deal size in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company (Offer date), and Deal size in million U.S. dollars in each Company (Offer date) on the y axis.
The Deal size in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company (Offer date) Uber Technologies (May 9) and lowest at Company (Offer date) DouYu International Holdings (Jul 16).
The highest Company (Offer date) Uber Technologies (May 9) has 7325.0 more Deal size in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Company (Offer date) DouYu International Holdings (Jul 16).
